subject: Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Track and Field
Autopsies
lead_paragraph: Antonio Pettigrew, a former Olympic sprinter, committed suicide by overdosing on a drug common to sleeping pills and allergy medications, according to an autopsy by the North Carolina medical examiner’s office.
snippet: Antonio Pettigrew, a former Olympic sprinter, committed suicide by overdosing on a drug common to sleeping pills and allergy medications, according to an autopsy by the North Carolina medical examiner’s office.
